column1: '''Bethos''' was the leader of the Woodmen in the tale of ''[[Turambar and the Foalókë]]''. His wife was a [[Gnomes
column2: Noldorin]] maiden, and they had one son, [[Tamar Lamefoot]]. Bethos was later slain in a foray.<ref>{{LT2
